749254725653131264.text: Find here my speech given this afternoon at the #LesetEtestions at the Wégimont domain https://t.co/wXcvUMKatH

749186330882629632.text: "I wish you an excellent afternoon in this magnificent Domaine de Wégimont" #RésancesEtePS

749186240382177280.text: "Having a big project is good, spreading it, winning it in elections and implementing it is even better!" #RencontresEtePS

749185687111495681.text: "But the PS promises to fight, to issue feasible ideas and make our society more fair & less unequal" #ReviewsEtePS

749185570992259072.text: "The PS does not promise to leave a blank page, because we do not change our society in a flash" #ReviewsEtePS

749185472224694272.text: "We must bring new solutions and new hopes through an innovative and ambitious socialist project" #ReviewsEtePS

749185207073472512.text: "We will put back on the table 2 strong ideas: free hot meal for all students & free school supplies" #ReviewsEtePS

749184894992023552.text: "Improving maternity leave from 15 to 20 weeks, and paternity leave from 10 to 15 days" #ReviewsEtePS

749184650040442880.text: "Unemployment benefits for self-employed persons who must stop their activity for reasons beyond their control" #ReviewsEtePS

749184445975003136.text: "Increase the minimum pension to 1300 euros for a single person and 1600 at the household rate" #ReviewsEtePS

749183931212238848.text: "We want to raise minimum allowances to 1100 euros per month, and 2300 to a household with two children" #ReviewsEtePS

749183712361938944.text: "I want to draw the contours of the social model that we want to implement in the years to come" #ReviewsEtePS

556418770101870592.text: Greetings in Liège: find my complete speech http://t.co/ntLBzWyCGT

556412942414270464.text: "To the right that has the financial power, let's oppose a left that has the power of solidarity"

556412795630399488.text: "The gathering of progressives from all walks of life is a solution for the future"

556412644400566273.text: "Material progress is not enough. We must create new spaces for solidarity, exchange, sharing, in short, human relations "

556412466717294592.text: "We can not continue like this. We need a refoundation of our social organization, our modes of production & management »

556412401298714624.text: "In contrast to these fatalists is the PS. For the PS, to be realistic is to understand reality to better transform it "

556412299582648320.text: "The right systematically invokes fatality. She tells us: 'we can not do otherwise', 'we have to be realistic' "

556412138198409219.text: "We have to change paradigms. As J. Rifkin puts it: 'What allowed capitalism's unheard-of success will turn against it' "

556411830906945536.text: "We want a levy of 5,000 € / year for those who, in addition to their homes and professional assets, have € 1.25 million"

556411671485632512.text: "The big political struggles take time. It took decades to have social security. We will also get the wealth tax »

556411365901238274.text: "The riches do not share naturally. It is normal for everyone to contribute to the common good according to his means »

556410173942951936.text: "We must fight to establish minimum social rules, such as a European minimum wage"

556409601856663552.text: "A Europe + solidary, + social, + strong, with a harmonized fiscal policy + common social bases"

556409522882109440.text: "We must drive a European evolution. The 19 countries that together have the euro should form a stronger Europe "

556408406261911552.text: "The PS, with its exceptional history, its experience, its values, is the political party best able to meet the challenges of tomorrow"

556408327304118273.text: Vows in Liège: "I want to reaffirm our commitment to freedom of expression and our rejection of anti-Semitism" http://t.co/wOrazdMO58

556408312447893506.text: "To barbarians and propagators of hate, we must respond firmly, the strength of our laws and the rigors of our rule of law"

555359246771310593.text: Press conference on the fight against terrorism and radicalism: find the proposals of the PS http://t.co/35GPaT8aWh

555336060562309120.text: "The PS has always had the security of the citizens at heart: @LOnkelinx created the OCAM and increased by 70% the means of State Security"

555334643512541184.text: "I welcome @rudivervoort's initiative to bring together the mayors and heads of the police zones of the Brussels municipalities concerned"

555334209590792192.text: "It is at the local level that prevention actions against radicalism are the most effective"

555333913795907584.text: "We must implement a real active watch on the net to detect sites advocating violent radicalism"

555333753317621761.text: "The PS demands heightened vigilance on places that are potential targets, such as newsrooms or places of worship"

555333215473651712.text: "The fight against anti-Semitism must be a national cause"

555332265350537216.text: "The prison can not be the school of terrorism: isolate certain prisoners, strengthen their supervision and staff training"

555331311880388608.text: "The PS will be vigilant for the gvt to keep its promises of financing the police, the army, the supervision in prison, information"

555330525184139264.text: "I am Charlie, I am Jewish, I am Palestinian, I am a victim of Boko Haram, I am a victim of all acts of violence and hatred"

555329989663801344.text: "We are ready to support, on a case-by-case basis, some measures of the govt, but we say: + efficiency and real financial means."

555329408266158080.text: "@PSofficiel takes its security responsibilities every day and we will continue to do so."

555328833889796096.text: "The @PSofficiel philosophy is security in freedom and solidarity."

461881442600239104.text: Here is my speech of May 1st @PSofficiel #MoreFortsEnsemble # 1May http://t.co/WpW9Llfde2

461815525736464384.text: We are hand in hand with the sp.a, unions & mutuals, to garner together new social conquests # 1May

461815001658191872.text: There has never been any social progress, no progress for the workers, no socialist relays in the government # 1May

461814255738974208.text: The socialist family must be unavoidable at the federal level and the PS the 1st party of Walloons and Brussels # 1May

461814055519662080.text: We also want to create 10,000 crèche places, 10,000 public housing units in Wallonia and 16,500 in Brussels # 1May

461813895158824960.text: The PS wants to hire 1,000 additional teachers to better fight against school failure # 1May

461813822559641600.text: Giving + to those who already have enough is not the solution. Contribute the 80,000 Belgians the rich, as the PS wants, yes # 1May

461813511761690624.text: The PS is the only one that commits to increase minimum pensions & disability benefits by 10% + index # 1May

461813233868103680.text: The PS is the only party that is committed to defend the automatic indexing of income in an absolute way! # 1 May

461813122597416960.text: The PS commits to increase the salary of more than 70% of the people who work: +120 euros net by month # 1May

461812920662650880.text: The PS guarantees a strong social security that leaves no one on the side of the road # 1May

461810491950895105.text: Liberals and the N-VA see huge tax giveaways to distribute to higher incomes and exemption from big money # 1May

461810404155723776.text: Liberals and the N-VA see the unraveling of workers' fundamental rights & the reduction of trade union rights # 1May

461810316721278976.text: To love oneself is to look together in the same direction. Liberals & N-VA see removal of indexation (wages & pensions) # 1May

461810178644783104.text: The threat of a government of all rights reunited has rarely been so obvious # 1May

461809879167283200.text: We socialists, we want a recovery that benefits everyone and first and foremost workers! # 1 May

461809392745480192.text: The PS is the party of workers and solidarity. So good day, Comrades, because this day belongs to you! # 1 May

461809327075250176.text: # 1May: we celebrate the socialist conquests since the 19th century, possible thanks to activists, union and socialist mutuality

461769917034143744.text: I wish each and every one a wonderful # 1May - Ik wens iedereen een prachtige # 1mei

448767477447942144.text: 'The guns fell silent long ago, as did the voices of the fallen soldiers. But their example will always continue to inspire us'

448767449610346496.text: 'We have to continue to draw lessons from the terrible war. Those who ignore the past are taking the risk to re-live it

448767039562579968.text: 'We, the Belgian and the American people, share and cherish the same values ​​of freedom, democracy and progress'

448766957186457600.text: 'On behalf of #Belgium, I wish to honor their memory and thank them and their families for their terrible sacrifice'

448766818917052416.text: 'And here in Waregem, to especially remember the Americans who lost their lives in our cities and our countryside'

448766642248769536.text: 'We are gathered today to remember the millions of soldiers and civilians who died during the First World War, in #Belgium and in Europe'

435505161885470720.text: 'Together, let's write the new chapters of Belgium!' # 50years #Bozar

435505093174382593.text: 'In the #Belgium of tomorrow, the one we are building together, there can not be two types of citizens' # 50years

435504996072042496.text: 'A us that embraces all citizens, regardless of their origin' # 50years

435504927314829313.text: 'I bet on our youth to strengthen solidarity and fraternity. We must (re) learn to say we '# 50years

435504746024419328.text: 'I encourage you to take your place and invest yourself fully in our society' # 50years

435504686796648449.text: 'The #Belgium of tomorrow will be built with you, thanks to you, for you, for your children & for the children of the citizens of our country'

435502862198919168.text: 'You are not passing travelers in Belgium. It can never be said enough: you are full citizens! ' #50 years

435502779717939200.text: 'I appeal to young citizens. Be curious, learn, study! It will not always be easy but hang in there! ' #50 years

435502538469953537.text: 'The successes of Belgians from immigrant backgrounds are more and more numerous and visible' # 50years

435502189419966464.text: 'Belgians with an immigrant background are still too often discriminated against, for ex. to find a job or housing '# 50years

435502072600203264.text: 'In the name of #Belgium, I want to express the gratitude of our country and thank them from the bottom of my heart' # 50years

435501944665571328.text: 'They were your parents and your grandparents. You can be proud of them. We can be proud of them! ' #50 years

435501651135569920.text: 'Present on all construction sites, in mines and factories, they helped build our current wealth' # 50years

435501286331805696.text: 'Thousands of workers from Morocco came to put their arms and talents at the service of our companies' # 50years

435501185924366338.text: '# 50jaar geleden tekenden België in Marokko een akkoord om duizenden werknemers naar yesterday te laten komen' #Bozar

435500921649643520.text: 'I would like to congratulate you for the 10 projects you have set up for the # 50 years of Moroccan immigration - it's Belgian!'

430259443050479616.text: 'U draagt ​​bij om van België een land te maken dat erkenning geniet en waarnaar wordt geluisterd op internationaal level' #diplomatiekedagen

430259179480416256.text: 'I want to thank you. You defend the image of our country. '

430258582303821824.text: 'I would like to send a message of support and hope to those fighting for the rights of women or LGBT'

430258253348757504.text: 'Our country is also a land of freedom. Belgium is committed to promoting human rights in its diplomatic action '

430258080694415361.text: Belgium will celebrate the centenary of the First World War with numerous ceremonies, in the presence of Heads of State and Government.

430257739080937472.text: 'Het is taak van Europa om eleven burgers beter te beschermen. Zo moet Europa from motor zijn voor de creatie van kwaliteitsvolle jobs'

430257530947002368.text: 'Het Europese project heeft slechts een toekomst als burgers zich erin kunnen vinden.'

430257121280950272.text: 'Binnenkort zijn het Europese verkiezingen en vrees bestaat dat euroceptici en wie tegen Europa is, goed zullen scoren'

430256818754174976.text: 'Belgium also asks to finalize a real Banking Union'

430256487626440704.text: 'We want a Europe that also develops a real industrial policy'

430256323859841024.text: 'We want the EU to invest heavily in pro-growth policies'

430256234567307264.text: 'Even though the European Union has recently taken a series of measures to support employment, it must go faster and further'

430256104325799936.text: Diplomatic Days / Diplomatieke dagen: 'I would like to greet all the foreign diplomats who have joined us today for this meeting'

429351687149457408.text: 'Come and discover this welcoming and efficient community that symbolizes Belgian diversity so well!'

429351387416113152.text: 'The multilingualism of German speakers and the mobility of workers are just two significant examples'

429351203592347648.text: 'The German-speaking Community is a model of openness, dynamism and modernity'

429350835999358976.text: 'It's a trademark of German speakers: you know how to make yourself heard while being constructive'

429349960136413184.text: 'The German-speaking Community is fully involved in the stability of our country and the new #Belgium we are building'

429348724335054848.text: 'It receives new skills to lead a policy better meeting the needs of German-speaking citizens'

429348421233672192.text: 'With the sixth state reform, the German-speaking Community consolidates its status as a federated entity in its own right'

428475857850859520.text: 'I am confident for our future, precisely because the foundation of our #values ​​http://t.co/jXmUTl5QHn

428475814368509952.text: 'Ik heb vertrouwen in de toekomst, net omdat we een stevige basis van gemeenschappelijke #waarden hebben' http://t.co/I8xxJ2ipbM

428475517411794944.text: 'It is on this base of common values ​​that we can build the Belgium of tomorrow'

428475443864666112.text: 'Vrijheid, gelijkheid, solidariteit maar ook verdraagzaamheid, openheid in respect ...' #waarden

428475394241888256.text: 'We kunnen proud zijn op of #waarden van vooruitgang in ons land' http://t.co/9tmHZEqr4s

428475289321353216.text: 'We can be very proud of the' progress values ​​of our country 'http://t.co/9dec4Qw8kb

428475108324544512.text: 'Meer dan is moeten we alle krachten mobiliseren om armoede & uitsluiting efficiënter te bestrijden' #waarden http://t.co/aqPqdxxFgz

428474945401008128.text: 'We must mobilize all the forces to fight more effectively poverty' #values ​​http://t.co/g4d81FqifW

428474779516272640.text: 'We hebben er allemaal baat bij om in een maatschappij te leven waar iedereen bij tegenslag op de anderen kan rekenen' #waarden

428474723333599232.text: 'We moeten ervoor zorgen dat alle burgers of social ladder kunnen opklimmen, los van hun social of culture situatie' #waarden

428474649543208960.text: 'I can not thank Belgium enough for hosting my family and giving me the opportunity to study' #values

428474514507591680.text: 'Vooruitgang start i / h hart van vrouwen & mannen alvorens zich te ontwikkelen dankzij onderwijs, cultuur' #waarden http://t.co/iBCIcx7r7H

428473919474237441.text: 'Progress is born first in the hearts of women & men to unfold through education, culture' #values ​​http://t.co/gSrNfF4Adm

428473722211950592.text: 'Our laws punish discrimination, dissemination of racist ideas & incitement to hatred or violence' #values

428473610807029760.text: 'The excesses, it is first necessary to oppose the rule of law and the authority of the State' #valeurs

428473503978115072.text: 'We can not accept that some are spreading into racist, anti-Semitic or xenophobic statements or attitudes' #values

428473221357502464.text: 'Het zijn die ongelijkheden, op dagdagelijkse basis, die we moeten blijven bestrijden' #waarden

428473097201930240.text: 'We hebben het voorrecht om in een respectvolle samenleving te leven maar we zien nog te veel mensen die gediscrimineerd worden' #waarden

428472947876315136.text: 'The health of a country is not only measured by our social-economic parameters, but also by our #values' http://t.co/QEAXEmxPgJ

428472701909757952.text: 'Gezondheid van een land valt niet enkel afte meten aan socio-economische parameters maar ook aan onze #waarden' http://t.co/ikiLzgojmR
